projects.name: Amazon Clone
projects.description: User Authentication: Implementing Firebase Authentication to allow users to sign up, sign in, and securely manage their accounts. Product Listings: Displaying a wide range of products with details such as images, descriptions, prices, and ratings, mirroring the functionality of the real Shopping Cart: Enabling users to add products to their shopping cart, view their selected items, and adjust quantities before proceeding to checkout. Real-time Database: Utilizing Firebase Realtime Database to store and retrieve product information, user data, and order details, ensuring seamless data synchronization across devices. Payment Processing: Integrating payment gateways to facilitate secure and convenient transactions, providing users with multiple payment options. Responsive Design: Ensuring that the Amazon Clone is fully responsive, allowing users to browse and shop seamlessly across various devices.

projects.name: Food Delivery Website
projects.description: User Authentication: We will create the user authentication system so that anyone can create an account and login this food order website. Shopping cart functionality: We will create the shopping cart functionality so that user can add food items in their cart and order food from this app. Payment gateway: We will also integrate the Stripe payment gateway to place the order and with online payment. Order status update: Then we will create the order status update features also.
